definition: A term commonly used to refer to a person's preferred season of the year, often associated with personal preferences, memories, and activities related to that specific time of the year.

examples.german: Im Sommer gehe ich gerne schwimmen.
examples.english: I like to go swimming in the summer.

examples.german: Der Herbst ist die beste Zeit, um spazieren zu gehen.
examples.english: Autumn is the best time for taking walks.

examples.german: Im Winter fahre ich gerne Ski.
Meine Lieblingsjahreszeit ist der Sommer, weil ich gerne draußen bin.
examples.english: My favorite season is summer because I like being outdoors.
